# [Interview #1069: WoR Signing Report - Awesomeness Summoned, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1069#22)

#### Question

Will there still be Hemalurgy in the Alloy of Law series?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
